about_the_game:
Tempomancy is a puzzle-action game where you can manipulate time itself. Travel through an esoteric and mysterious place, and unfold the enigma of the tempomancy.

MEET THE TEMPOMANCER

A forgotten prisoner. Little is known about his past life, even he has only vague memories. A novice wizard looking to navigate the world and the challenges that lie before him with his unique abilities:
  • Time Catch: Charge Time energy as a spear, aim it and launch it at will, slowing down anything moving at sight.
  • Time Dragger: Charge time energy like a dagger and throw it at any location, being pulled to that location with extreme speed.
  • Past Visions: Creates a Magic Field that allows you to see things as they were in the past: the broken becomes functional, the dead becomes alive. It is only an echo, everything remains still, like a trace of what it was.

EXPLORE THE LANDS OF FISSRA

Fissra is a world governed by the will of the stars. The influence of the astral bodies streches, breaks and folds the continent onto massive floating islands. In the current Era, Fissra is devastated by the casualties of The Eclipse, the biggest magic phenomenon ever happened, full of megalitic crystals and ruins of past civilizations.

FIGHT DYNAMIC BOSSES

The Bosses of Tempomancy are focused on showing the player the dynamic uses of the puzzle mechanics learned along the way. They represent both the greatest challenge and the most intense experience of each zone and thematic civilization of the game.

  • Past Visions: Creates a Magic Field that allows you to see things as they were in the past: the broken becomes functional, the dead becomes alive. It is only an echo, everything remains still, like a trace of what it was.

In the current Era, Fissra is devastated by the casualties of The Eclipse, the biggest magic phenomenon ever happened, full of megalitic crystals and ruins of past civilizations.

name: Tempomancy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 | AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 | AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 | AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Overcome any obstacle in the surreal adventure of the Tempomancer and discover the secrets that the forbidden lands of Fissra hide, always with Time on your side.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
